name: Gataela
summary: A Victorian Steampunk RPG where saving the Kingdom requires more than just brains and brawn: you also need to talk to people! Featuring a debate battle system, talk, debate, convince and negotiate with NPCs in order to save the country!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 游戏引擎: Cocos2dx,C/C++
  • 游玩人数: Single-player
  • 发行日期: 2017-03-08 (Demo)
  • 官方网站: http://gataela.com/
  • 官方网站: https://atemly-games.itch.io/gataela
  • 官方网站: http://gamejolt.com/games/gataela/235941
